title: Machine Learning Design Strategies for Comprehensive Property Improvement of TWIP Steel

context.prior_knowledge: Basic materials science and engineering knowledge, proficiency in using online learning tools
context.additional_context: A competency-strengthening program for prospective/in-service corporate trainers, educating them on machine learning-based methodologies to enhance TWIP steel properties for practical application.

learning_goals: Explain the correlation between microstructure and mechanical properties of TWIP steel.
Perform steel design optimization processes using machine learning models (regression prediction and SHAP analysis).
Submit a design proposal for high-strength and high-ductility TWIP steel by applying multi-objective optimization techniques.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
